turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, look can you get a Starbucks pick up can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want to order for pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Venti salted caramel mocha with whole milk, whipped cream, and sprinkles on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want this drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which Starbucks did you want to pick up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Spring Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've got your order for 1 iced venti salted caramel mocha, with whole milk, whipped cream, and sprinkles on top from the starbucks on spring street in new york city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct? or did i need to change anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect. the total is $4.50. i'll place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: my pleasure. it'll b ready in 15 mins. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. have a great day.
